page.title: 13Public Transport
page.content: Public Transport is very important to people who do not have private transport,either to go to work or just to go shopping.There are only two bus services that actually stop in Maple Cross,the Green Line and the W4.The Green Line may cease to run through Maple Cross soon,it may go along the new M25 instead,this would be a faster way to travel. The buses in Maple Cross are not very widely used because most people own a private vehicle. In Maple Cross there is an idustrial estate which is the only one in our 'D' block. In our 'D' block there are only five squares with bus services, most of which run through the Maple Cross squares.Apart from having few bus services Maple Cross does not have a train service either.
